subtitle: The dignified king of knights, who always keeps her distant dream in her heart, and now...
description: Finally a PVC product line has started from the new figure makers, Gift! The first figure to be released is the ultimate servant, Saber, from "Fate/Stay Night".The beautiful sculpting work has been done by Satoshi Toda, and he has created a figure that not only shows Saber's vigor as the king of knights, but also shows her delicacy. As a special first production extra, head parts sculpted by Ikuma Kuramoto (Millimeter Models) will be included. Don't miss out on this otherwise impossible collaboration!
name: Saber (せいばー)

subtitle: The long-awaited third figure in the Muv-Luv series!
description: From the PC game with thousands of fanatical fans "Muv-Luv Alternative" comes a PVC figure of the main heroine, Sumika Kagami! She is wearing the reinforced suit that she wears while riding the Susanoo 4th Model. She's holding a heart as a personal motif of her energetic, cheerful personality, which has been captured beautifully in this figure. The carefully sculpted base can be connected to the other three bases in the series.
name: Sumika Kagami (かがみ すみか)

subtitle: Sculpted with all the charm from the illustration!!
description: The second in the set of figures based on original illustrations drawn by the popular artist Shunya Yamashita, just for the LILICS series of figures!Sculpted in a unique pose, while holding a huge sword, leaves this figure with both an artistic and sensual feel. Two of Shunya Yamashita's specialties - cute eyes and a mature body have both been wonderfully sculpted into this figure.  Her costume makes use of a design which creates a beautiful blend of science fiction and fantasy elements.Enjoy the originality and skill behind the LILICS series!
name: Nasca (なすか)

subtitle: A cute girl with a massive weapon!!
description: A figure based on the original character drawn by famous manga artist Mine Yoshizaki.She is sculpted in a cute costume that brings out her bodyline, with an overwhelmingly huge weapon that looks far too big for her. She has large eyes and a vivid collar, which are both some of Mine Yoshizaki's specialities.She was sculpted by G.O from the popular Cerberus Project.
name: Limit Gunz (りみっとがんつ)
copyright: © 吉崎観音/マッグガーデン

subtitle: To avenge the death of his friend!
description: Guile, a major in the United States Air Force, has joined the Revolech SFO collection!

copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: The iron trooper, here to open the path to the future!
description: A new addition to the 35MAX series has been announced - another figure from "Armored Trooper VOTOMS: Commander Vorct", an original story which is currently being serialized in Hobby Japan magazine. This time we see the Scopedog Assault, a freshly designed mech ridden by the main character, Captain Rane. A turbo unit is included to recreate motion scenes, and pile bunkers can be attached to various parts of the mech using electromagnets. The head parts that were used during underwater exploration are also included. This perfection is truly suited to the strongest of the ATs!

description: An original character from Street Fighter Online, based on a character from the Chinese novel "The Smiling, Proud Wanderer" written by Jinyong.  Reikochuu has been added to the SFO Revoltech Collection! With an unbeatable skill in swordplay, Reikochuu is a user of the Dugu Nine Swords, but is also a do-gooder and a cheerful drinker.
name: Revoltech SFO Reikochuu (SFO れいこちゅう りぼるてっく)
copyright: © CAPCOM U.S.A., INC. 2008, © DALETTO CO., LTD. 2008 ALL RIGHTSRESERVED.

subtitle: What's that coming into view? A lot of bare skin... and a pumpkin!
description: Following the release of Chuchu Astram from the popular PC game "Chu X Chu Idol" comes the kind-hearted manager, Pixie Hiyori! Although she normally has a very calm, relaxed personality, these clothes from the demon world definitely give her a much more provocative appearance! The pumpkin hat on her head is also a charming addition to her costume. Not to mention that both that costume and the pumpkin can be removed, allowing you to display an even sexier Hiyori whenever you want!

subtitle: Pressing even further into the battle!
description: ATELIER-SAI brings you the seventh figure set in the new "Battle Soldiers" series as a part of the revolutionary "GENEBLOCK" toy series.The battle between the "Guardian Side" and the "Bloody Sword Side" has just become even more devastating than before. Each of the figures in the series are created with a simple framework, which creates warriors that can be moved and played with easily. Each character has their own specific weapon included. Even more fun will open up to you once you've collected the whole set of warriors!
name: BATTLE SOLDIERS 7 (ばとるそるじゃーず だい７だん)

subtitle: Good wife! Dictator! Scary wife! Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki!
description: From the popular anime "Kyouran Kazoku Nikki", comes a nendoroid of the Midarezaki family's mother, Kyouka Midarezaki! At first glance she looks like a little girl with cat ears and a tail, but she actually claims that she is 20 years old! Her egotistical presence has been faithfully recreated in this figure, whilst also keeping her cute appearance in mind. Three face parts are included, and the third daughter of the Midarezaki family, Gekka Midarezaki is also included!
name: Nendoroid Kyouka Midarezaki (みだれざき  きょうか)
series: Kyouran Kazoku Nikki (Diary of a Crazed Family)
copyright: © 2008 Akira／PUBLISHED BY ENTERBRAIN,INC.／超常現象対策局分室

subtitle: The final master of the Book of Darkness, figma Hayate Yagami - Set Up!
description: From Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha StrikerS comes a figma of the commanding officer of Riot Force 6 - Hayate Yagami, wearing her knight armour.
features: The new joint parts allow for a smooth look, yet poseable movements, allowing you to pose many different scenes
One of the two face parts included has been sculpted to depict Hayate's truly determined expression.
Her armed device "Schwertkruez" is included, as well as the "Book of Darkness" which can be held both open, and closed.
The feathers on her back are made from a clear plastic, and along with her hat can be removed, allowing for even more poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Hayate Yagami: Knight Armour ver. (ふぃぐま やがみはやて きしかっちゅうver.)

subtitle: The cute mermaid walking down the path of chivalry - figma San Seto!

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.

Interchangeable parts are included to recreate her mermaid transformation that occurs when she gets wet.
A long yakuza sword is included along with a scabbard that it can be sheathed in. The catears from episode 20 are also included.
Face parts allowing for either a smiling face or a cold glare are included; as well as  various hand parts, including one used to hold the sword.
Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.

copyright: © 木村太彦/スクウェアエニックス･瀬戸内魚類協同組合

subtitle: The perfect new year's gift for that special person... or just for yourself.

The third season is currently airing on MTV, and it is still just as well acclaimed as when it originally aired.

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
Three expressions are included - a 'normal face', a 'smiling face' and an 'angry face', enough expression to make her not seem like a robot!
The machine guns that attach to both arms can be attached and removed, and her 'Rocket Punch' arm is also included.

subtitle: figma Yoshika Miyafuji... take off!

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.

Both her striker unit and her weapon, the 2nd model 99 aircraft cannon are both included, and special care has been placed on the ever-important lower body clothing, which have been made as "shift:body" pieces, which are high quality non-posable body parts.
Her ears and tail that appear when using magic power are both included, as well as replaceable parts on the striker unit that allow rotating and still propellers.
Three facial expressions are included: a normal face, a shouting face and a happy face as if Yoshika is touching something "big and soft".
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: The first in the Evangelion figma series is finally on its way!
description: From the second 'Rebuild of Evangelion' movie comes the heroine shrouded in mystery, Makinami Mari Illustrious!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
The neck features a brand new double figma joint that allows for a multitide of new facial expressions.
Her torso is made from a combination of hard and soft materials, leaving the feeling of the plugsuit as realistic as possible.
You can recreate various scenes of Mari piloting her suit using the included interior of the entry-plug, which features posable renditions of the seat, control lever and more!
Three expressions are included: A smiling face, a grinning face perfect for Mari, and even the screaming face she put on while in beast mode.
Exchangeable parts to recreate the "beast mode" scene are included, along with parts that give the back of her head a different look.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Makinami Mari Illustrious: New Plugsuit ver. (ふぃぐま まきなみ・まり・いらすとりあす しんがたぷらぐすーつばーじょん)

subtitle: A super-strong mold residue cleaner!
description: This is an aerosol based quick-drying residue cleaning cream. It is designed to clean away the residue formed by the mold lubricant when creating a resin kit.  It comes with an attachable pipe nozzle which allows you to get into the harder to clean areas with less effort than ever before. It's great for cleaning both polypropylene and polyethylene-resin products, as well as paint removal on resin and metal models.
name: MSS-21 GSR: Resin Cleaner (MSS-21 GSRれじんくりんまぐなむ)

subtitle: The gentle childhood friend with a knack for cooking. ♪

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept, without compromising posability.
To compliment her cooking skill she comes with a variety of kitchen utensils, such as a frying pan and a kitchen knife.
An apron is included and made from flexible plastic allowing it to bend around the body naturally.
A variety of hand parts are included, such as hands for holding chopsticks as well as hands in cooking mittens!
Two facial expressions from the game are included: A bright smile and a surprised face.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

The front parts of her hair can be removed allowing the attachment and removal of her mask. Combined with the two expressions, this allows for various options!
The sombre black lustre of her armor with its blood red streaks have all been sculpted into her figma preserving the truly dark atmosphere around her.
Her Noble Phantasm, 'Excalibur', is also included - dyed a dark black just like the rest of her armor.

This third set is filled with musical instruments to let your Nendoroids prepare for the upcoming Culture Festival! The set is split into two - this A set features the window-side of the classroom.
features: The window is made from clear plastics. The blackboard can really be drawn on and erased with chalk.
A Nendoroid sized piano, guitar and saxophone are all included for your Nendoroids to play if the situation arises. (along with a guitar case that opens and closes)
You can connect the A and B set to create the full classroom.
You can also connect other sets onto the top of this set, allowing you to create a two-story high building if you combine this set with the School Life Set.

subtitle: Seven color variations of vibrantly colored, silk-screen printed decals!
description: These GSR Color Decals are available in the following seven commonly used colors: white, yellow, red, blue, silver, black and matt black.The decals are printed using high quality silk-screen printing. Each sheet has a solid area of color, along with nine strips of color, measuring 0.3mm, 0.4mm, 0.5mm, 0.75mm, 1.0mm, 1.2mm, 1.5mm, 1.7mm and 2.0mm - meaning there is a size for almost any of your needs. Each sheet measures 200mm X 140mm.
features: High-quality silk-screen printing. Seven colors available.
Nine separately sized stripes allows versatility with all kinds of model building.
Designed to work efficiently with both the "GSR: Decal Fitter" and "GSR: Decal Fitter Pro"
name: MSS-11~17: GSR Color Decals (MSS-11〜17 GSRからーでかーる)

subtitle: Softens decals allowing a perfect fit even on curved or uneven surfaces!!
description: By removing the glue component from the original GSR Decal Fitter and improving the formula, this new stronger Decal Fitter has become available.Easily one of the strongest decal softeners available, the GSR Decal Fitter Pro allows decals to be placed without a wrinkle on even curved or uneven surfaces,  and prevents silvering (when parts of the decal do not stick down correctly, causing an uneven surface). It is also very compatible with GRS: Edged Cotton Swabs. Please note that applying too much Decal Fitter can cause decals to melt, so apply the solution carefully. Each bottle contains 30ml of Decal Fitter.
features: Softens any decals for easy application -  thick or thin, hard or soft.
Specifically designed original formula used to effectively soften decals.
Can be used with the original GSR Decal Fitter for even faster application.
name: MSS-10: GSR Decal Fitter Pro (MSS-10 GSRでかーるごうりきなんかざい)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: The patterns that are often seen on racing cars and high performance cars have been made in carbon decals for all to add to their favourite model cars. Each sheet contains two differently sized twisting patterns, allowing it to be used on any model cars from a 1/43rd scale all the way up to a 1/24th scale. The decals are printed entirely though silk-screening giving them a shiny gloss effect as well as making them easy to apply. They are designed to work with the GSR Decal Fitter, allowing easy placement even on curved surfaces.
name: MSS-06: GSR Carbon Decals G (Gray) (MSS-06 GSRかーぼんでかーるG（ぐれー）)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: A set of windscreen wipers created from etched stainless steel allowing you to increase the level of detail on your favorite model cars! The 'TYPE-A' windscreen wiper is the silver windscreen wiper with a short arm and blade, commonly seen on most Japanese cars today. The double-link type used on Abarth cars, as well as the double-arm type used on racing cars are included in the set. Instant glue is recommended when attaching the wipers to a car.
name: MSS-08: Wiper Set (TYPE A) (MSS-08 GSRわいぱーせっと TYPE A)

subtitle: Fall in love with its sharp eyes!
description: The second figure to join Phat Company's 'Dokidoki Animal Series' is the Shoebill - also known as the 'statue bird'. The figure is approximately the same scale as figma action figures, so they can easily be displayed together.
name: Dokidoki Animal Series: Shoebill (どきどきどうぶつしりーず はしびろこう)

subtitle: Pick the right tools for the job!
description: A set of windscreen wipers created from etched stainless steel allowing you to increase the level of detail on your favorite model cars! The 'TYPE-B' windscreen wiper is the common black windscreen wiper with a long arm and blade, commonly seen on most Japanese cars today. The set includes various lengths and shapes, allowing you to pick the right look for whichever car you choose to attach it to. Instant glue is recommended when attaching the wipers to a car.
name: MSS-09: Wiper Set (TYPE B) (MSS-09 GSRわいぱーせっと TYPE B)

subtitle: Sakura High School's live festival performance is here! ♪
description: From the well-known anime 'K-ON' comes new Nendoroids of the K-ON club's bassist 'Mio Akiyama' and drummer 'Ritsu Tainaka' wearing the outfits from the Sakura High Festival performance!
name: Nendoroid K-ON! Mio and Ritsu: Live Stage Set (ねんどろいど けいおん！みお＆りつらいぶすてーじせっと)
sculptor: Mio by Yukiwo Ageta and Ritsu by Maruhige
copyright: © かきふらい・芳文社／桜高軽音部

subtitle: Pretty Cure decals for use on 1/24th scale models!  Filled with the charming smiles of the Pretty Cure duo!

The A4 sheet of decals are not only filled with illustrations of both 'Cure Black' and 'Cure White', but also include various symbols and signs familiar to the series, allowing you to give your favorite model cars a whole new feel to them!

Each sheet contains two differently sized twisting patterns, allowing it to be used on any model cars from a 1/43rd scale all the way up to a 1/24th scale. The decals are printed entirely though silk-screening giving them a shiny gloss effect as well as making them easy to apply. subtitle: Come on! Come on! Come on!
description: Come on, Aztecaser!  This new figure from the series 'Pro-Wrestling Star Aztecaser' is here to join Max Factory's Soft Vinyl figure series. The figure is Tomokazu Seki's 9th release, and it is sculpted to keep the style from the original as best as possible! It's a must have for any soft vinyl collectors and fans of the series!

Her expression has also been altered to a subtle smile as she brandishes her glimmering sword through the air.
name: Saber Lily ~Golden Caliburn~ (せいばー・りりぃ ～しょうりすべきおうごんのけん（かりばーん）～)
copyright: © TYPE-MOON © EIGHTING © cavia © CAPCOM CO., LTD

subtitle: The 13th Zoalord, Imakarum Mirabilis!
description: After two and a half years of silence, the 'Bio Booster Armor Guyver' BFC-MAX series is back, and to welcome back the series is the Zoalord equipped with the ability to control gravity and space, Imakarum Mirabilis!
name: BFC-MAX12: Zoalord Imakarum Mirabilis (BFC-MAX12 ぞあろーど いまからむ・みらーびりす)

subtitle: A lyrical, magical Nendoroid! ♪
description: Nanoha Takamachi, the main character from the long-awaited theatrical debut of the Nanoha series 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st', is joining the Nendoroid world, with her newly designed barrier jacket shunk down to Nendoroid size with her!
name: Nendoroid Nanoha Takamachi: The MOVIE 1st Ver. (ねんどろいど たかまちなのは ざ むーびー ふぁーすと ばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The magical girl with a lonesome glint in her eyes.
description: From the popular upcoming movie 'Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st' comes a figma the second main character, 'Fate Testarossa' releasing at the same time as the movie!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for posable areas, allowing proportions to be kept, and not compromising posability even on a figure smaller than 120mm in height.
Her device 'Bardiche' is included with replaceable parts, allowing 'Axe Form', 'Scythe Form' and even 'Grave Form' to be recreated.
Her removable cloak includes two figma joints, making it possible to give it a feeling of motion, and more accurately create the scenes from the show.
Two expressions are included - a smiling face and a shouting expression.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Fate Testarossa: The MOVIE 1st ver. (ふぃぐま ふぇいと・てすたろっさ ざ むーびー ふぁーすと ばーじょん)
series: Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The MOVIE 1st

subtitle: The reliable younger sister.
description: Following closely behind her older sister, comes a figma of Ui Hirasawa to continue the K-ON figma series! Ui will only be available as a limited edition Wonder Festival item.
name: figma Ui Hirasawa: School Uniform ver. (ふぃぐま ひらさわうい せいふくver.)

subtitle: Even more cute, albeit slightly strange characters to collect!

name: PETIT IDOLM@STER - Trading Rubber Charms: Stage 02 (とれーでぃんぐらばーすとらっぷ ぷちます！すてーじ02)

description: ex:ride - vehicles that can be ridden by the figma series of action figures, brought to you by FREEing.  The third set in the series is a 'Street Style' set, including a skateboard, a kick scooter and in-line skates! The skateboard also comes complete with a set of decals, for you to customize however you like.
name: ex:ride: ride.003 - Street Style Set (えくすらいど らいど003 すとりーとすたいるせっと)

subtitle: A special Miku to commemorate the Sapporo Snow Festival!

Pylori' and 'Song of the H. Rin Pylori' are in the set, as well as 'Toeto', the character based on Luka Megurine but wearing a cute cat hat!

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

The main body of the figma is made with a combination of hard and soft plastics, leaving the feeling of the plugsuit just as it should be.
The interior of the Entry Plug is also included to recreate your favorite scenes from the cockpit. Various parts in the cockpit such as the seat and control lever are also movable.
Three expressions are included: an expressionless face perfectly suited to Rei, a glaring face for combat scenes and the smiling face that she only showed to the openhearted.
The S-DAT player that played an important role in the film is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
His right-hand pincer from his Strike Vent, and shield from his Guard Vent are both included.
The weapon based off his summoned monster Volcancer is also included.
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hands to hold his weapons.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamen Rider Incisor (ふぃぐま かめんらいだー いんさいざー)
sculptor: マックスファクトリー・浅井真紀
copyright: © 2009 ISHIMORI PRODUCTION INC.,TOEI COMPANY, LTD.,　ADNESS ENTERTAINMENT CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED..

subtitle: The blue flash that shoots through the darkness - 1/24th scale decals of the popular Black Rock Shooter.
description: From the anime "Black Rock Shooter" comes a sheet of decals featuring various images of Black Rock Shooter and Dead Master to place on your favorite 1/24th scale cars. Along with the various illustrations of the characters themselves, the decal sheet also features various images that bring out the world of Black Rock Shooter, allowing you to create a complete itasha using the decals.
name: GSR Character Customize Series Decals 018: Black Rock Shooter - 1/24th Scale (GSRきゃらくたーかすたまいずしりーず でかーる018／ぶらっく★ろっくしゅーたー)

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.

She also comes with effect parts for Strada to recreate some action packed fighting scenes.
She comes with her standard face as well as a shouting face. A replaceable fringe part is also included.
A total of ten hand parts are included which allow her to hold her weapons at various angles for a number of different poses.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

A flexible plastic is used for various parts on the body of the figma, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability! It's easier than ever before to pose those Kamen Rider action scenes!
His summoned gun is included, along with his Shoot Vent's hand-held cannon. You can create a variety of scenes that show off his impressive firepower!
A total of ten hand parts are included, which includes hand parts to hold cards.

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three expressions are included: A standard expression, a pleased expression and a slightly worried expression.
Her antique camera, notebook and a pen all needed for her reports are included.
A leaf shaped fan and black wings are both included, ideal for a crow tengu. Her companion crow Bunbunmaru is also included.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

They are designed to be the perfect size for a necklace - noticeable, but not too big!

subtitle: The Second Child - Shikinami Asuka Langley, the figma!
description: From "Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance" comes a figma of EVA 2's determined pilot, Shikinami Asuka Langley!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
The neck has an all new figma joint that features a double joint, meaning you can create even more unique poses than before!
The main body of the figma is made with a combination of hard and soft plastics, leaving the feeling of the test-plugsuit just as it should be.
The interior of the Entry Plug is also included to recreate your favorite scenes from the cockpit. Various parts in the cockpit such as the seat and control lever are also movable.
Three expressions are included: a smiling face, a determined shouting face and the embarrassed face she gave when she first wore the test plugsuit.
A variety of optional parts are included, such as the puppet and cell phone from the movie, as well as replaceable parts for when she sits in the Entry Plug.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Shikinami Asuka Langley: Test Plugsuit ver. (ふぃぐま しきなみ・あすからんぐれー てすとぷらぐすーつばーじょん)

A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
There are two separate face parts, a standard version and one with the visor open allowing you to see inside.
His main weapon, the Tekk Lancer is included in both its standard version and the cross version seen in the show.
The shoulder parts can be connected to the arm to recreate the 'Ram Shoulder' attack from the series.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

subtitle: "I'll show you the resolution of a Sentinel, and you'll never forget it!"
description: From the anime series, 'Senki Zesshou Symphogear' comes a figma of the young girl who decides to fight against the Noise, Tsubasa Kazanari!
features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard serious expression, a shouting face for combat scenes as well as a gentle smiling face.
The katanas she uses to combat the Noise are included, along with the smaller dagger that can be stabbed into shadows to prevent movement.
You can also pose her preforming the 'Reverse Rakshasa' attack using attachable blades for her legs.
A posable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tsubasa Kazanari (ふぃぐま かざなりつばさ)

description: The full 3DCG anime series 'wooser's hand-to-mouth life' has started airing on TV Tokyo as well as on niconico! subtitle: "D-Boy and Takaya Aiba are no more! I am Tekkaman Blade!"
description: From the anime series 'Tekkaman Blade' comes a figma of the Tekkaman that the main character transforms into - Tekkaman Blade!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
There are two separate face parts, a standard version and one with the visor open allowing you to see inside.
The Tekk Lancer is included and can be separated into two different parts.
The Tekk Shield stored in his hip can be equipped and removed.
You can release his ultimate attack, 'Voltekka' by opening up his shoulders.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Tekkaman Blade (ふぃぐま てっかまんぶれーど)

subtitle: The good-natured but bluntly humored Koyomi is also going on resale!
description: figma Koyomi Araragi is also going on resale to join figma Hitagi Senjyogahara! If you missed them the first time, now is your chance to grab them!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for his jacket, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
He comes with three expressions: his standard face, a surprised face and the face he always gave after telling a bad joke.
A variety of extra parts are included, such as his school bag, extra hair parts to reveal his left eye and even effect parts to recreate battle scenes.
Extra hand parts for figma Hitagi Senjyogahara are also included which allow you to display her holding a pencil - you can create all kinds of scenes between them now.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Koyomi Araragi (ふぃぐま あららぎこよみ)
copyright: © 西尾維新／講談社・アニプレックス・シャフト

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

features: Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.

subtitle: The selfless Mami is joining the Puella Magi figma, ready to fight off some witches!
description: From the popular anime series, 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica', comes a figma of the veteran Puella Magi, Mami Tomoe!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions: a standard face, winking face and a desperate face for when things don't go her way.
Her hat is included and can be worn or removed with any of the expressions for even more variety.
She also comes with six muskets, along with a little musket stand for each one of them.
The Candy Witch from episode three of the anime series is also included!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Mami Tomoe (ふぃぐま ともえまみ)

subtitle: The kindhearted Muramasa, wearing a maid uniform and ready to serve!

name: Muramasa Sansei (さんせいむらまさ)

subtitle: The King of Overtaking - captivating everyone who watches him race!
description: The F1 race driver with an impressive track record, Kamui Kobayashi, is joining the figma line-up!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
The coloring of the helmet and racing suit have been faithfully reproduced in figma form.
Different head parts allowing you to display him wearing either his helmet or his cap are included.
He also comes with a HANS device to place around his neck to prevent injuries.
Various hand parts are included, such as hands holding his gloves which let you recreate the scene just before the big race.
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kamui Kobayashi (ふぃぐま こばやしかむい)

subtitle: Japan's strongest swordswoman is joining the figma line-up!

features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with a standard expression, a ladylike embarrassed expression and a focused expression for combat.
She comes with various optional parts including a sword and dagger with effect parts, as well as a giant rice ball.
Her helmet can be attached and removed using replaceable parts.
Ten different hand parts are included allowing her to hold weapons at all kinds of angles for all sorts of poses!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Kenshin Uesugi (ふぃぐま うえすぎけんしん)

subtitle: Carry Kyubey around with you!
description: From the popular anime 'Puella Magi Madoka Magica' comes a special ball-point pen featuring Kyubey, including some recordings of his voice! The design of the pen is based on  Madoka's illustration in the series, with a little Kyubey on the top holding a Soul Gem. If you press down on Kyubey, he'll say one of his lines from the series!
name: Kyubey Pen with Voice (きゅぅべえぼいすつきぺん)

subtitle: The lovable nun who is always hungry, and loves to eat!
description: From 'Toaru Majutsu no Index II' comes a figma of the nun with a perfect memory, Index!
features: Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for specific areas, which allows proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Her skirt is made from fabric, allowing for easy posing even in her long skirt.
She comes with three expressions - a standard face, an upset face and the face with sparkling eyes that she had whenever she insisted on something.
The wimple that she wears on her head can be removed using separate hair parts.
She comes with various hand parts, including praying hands and hands holding a knife and fork.
Her kitten, Sphinx, is also included to be displayed by her side - or on her head!
A poseable figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
name: figma Index (ふぃぐま いんでっくす)
